Package com.rift.coad.lib.common

Class Summary
ClassUtil This class supplies some methods for performing tests on classes.
FileUtil This class is responsible for supplying simple file utilities
JarUtil This class supplies methods to interact with a jar file.
ObjectSerializer This class is responsible for serializing and deserializing objects.
ObjectSerializer.ClassLoaderObjectInputStream This class overrides the resolve to use the class loader on the thread to find the specified class.
RandomGuid This object is responsible for generating a random guid.
ResourceReader This object is responsible for loading in text resources stored within the the class path.
TextFile This class is responsible for reading in the text file it is pointed at.
 

Exception Summary
CommonException This exception gets thrown by the common libraries.
